name: Red Holes
description:
This is a Space Game. In this game you are controlling a Ball by tilting a plattform left or right, while avoiding the Red Holes. On your Journey you can also find some usefull Coins, which can be used to buy some Skins in the Shop. And last but not least you will find some Items, which will help you proceding on your hunt to the best Highscore.

To the Controlles:

Use A/D or the arrow Keys to tilt the Plattform

PS: This is my first ever completed game and my first GameJam.

For all of you, who read through this, there is a cheatcode hidden in the game. You can find it in the information menu (question mark button)
